name: Apple Bang!
description:
Be a good knife thrower maid and complete the apple mission of your master lady!

-Maid's life is one. If you die, you must return to the starting point.

-Avoid the many traps that target you

-Don't forget you're running an apple errand. You have to get an apple somehow!

-You can see multiple endings according to your choice.

- Watch what the NPCs say! They are giving you a hint.
